power.title: Assassin's Bane
power.fluff: The ground blackens as coruscating energy swirls around you, hindering your foes' movements and revealing any hidden enemies

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The burst becomes a zone of coruscating energy until the end of your next turn.
Enemies within the zone cannot shift or teleport, and don't benefit from invisibility, concealment, or total concealment.

element.name: Sustain Minor:
element.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Eyes of the Spider Queen
power.fluff: A cluster of dull black eyes appears on your forehead, giving you enhanced sight in darkness and a limited power to see the unseen

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain darkvision.
In addition, you can see invisible objects and creatures that are adjacent to you.

element.name: Special:
element.text: If you use this power outside of combat, it lasts for 1 hour or the end of the next encounter, whichever is shorter, instead.

power.title: Shadow Blend
power.fluff: You draw forth shadow from the nearby darkness to conceal you from your foes

element.name: Prerequisite:
element.text: You must have the Shadow Walk feature

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: You start your turn within 2 squares of dim light or darkness

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Your Shadow Walk activates without you having to move.

power.title: Beguiling Tongue
power.fluff: You channel the grace and glibness of your fey patrons for a time, your voice gaining great power and eloquence

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You are considered trained in the next Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate check you make during this encounter.
If you are already trained in the skill, you instead gain a +3 power bonus to the check.

power.title: Fevered Certainty of Caiphon
power.fluff: You send your thoughts to Caiphon the Dream Whisperer, whose reply from beyond the farthest void floods your body and mind with mad certainty

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 power bonus to all skill and ability checks.
You also take a -2 penalty to Will defense and have vulnerable 5 to psychic damage.

power.title: Shadow Veil
power.fluff: You garb yourself in a pall of murky darkness that renders you difficult to see or hear

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You are considered trained in Stealth until the end of your next turn.
If you are already trained in Stealth, you instead gain a +3 power bonus to checks with it.

element.name: Shadow Walk:
element.text: If your Shadow Walk activates while this power is in effect, you gain total concealment instead of partial concealment.

power.title: Caiphon's Leap
power.fluff: You call upon Caiphon the Dream Whisperer, and with his aid you move out of harm's way

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: An enemy under your curse hits you with a melee attack

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You reduce the damage from the triggering attack by one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier.
After the triggering attack has been resolved, you teleport up to 3 squares. If you took damage, increase the number of squares teleported by your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Fey Bargain
power.fluff: You gain a chance of good luck now in exchange for assured bad luck later

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: You miss an attack roll with a Warlock power

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You reroll the triggering attack roll, using the second result even if it is worse.
You automatically fail your first saving throw before the end of the encounter.

power.title: Spectral Fade
power.fluff: You become misty and transparent, fading from your enemies' view for a moment

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You become invisible until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Charm of Hearts
power.fluff: Your enemies might not love you, but thanks to this charm crafted by the Prince of Hearts, they do not attack you when you give them the opportunity

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, your actions do not trigger opportunity actions or other actions, thought their results might. For example, enemies cannot trigger actions based on your attacking them, but could trigger actions from becoming bloodied.
In addition, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses.

element.name: Sustain Minor:
element.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Fell Resilience
power.fluff: You call upon your patron to protect you with their fell power, your flesh becoming infused with mystic strength that lessens the effect of enemy blows

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: A creature under your warlock's curse is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

element.name: Infernal Pact:
element.text: These temporary hit points stack with your dark one's blessing.

power.title: Spider Scuttle
power.fluff: Shadowy spider legs sprout from your body, allowing you to scuttle across the ground and easily scale a nearby surface

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a climb speed equal to your speed.
In addition, you do not need your hands free to climb and can also crawl at this speed.

element.name: Sustain Minor:
element.text: The climb speed is reduced by 1. If it is not reduced to 0, the effect persist until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Devil's Trade
power.fluff: You call on infernal powers to gain temporary relief at the cost of increased suffering

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You end one effect currently affecting you.
In addition, you gain vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: Vulnerable 10.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: Vulnerable 15.

element.name: Special:
element.text: If an effect prevents you from taking actions, you can still use this power on your turn to end that effect.

power.title: Ruinous Phrase
power.fluff: The words that leave your lips resonate within an object, causing it to shatter

element.name: Target:
element.text: One Medium size or smaller construct or unattended object

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: Large size or smaller

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: Huge size or smaller

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target takes damage equal to your level + 5, or twice that if it is an unattended non-magical object.
If the target has vulnerable to thunder damage, that vulnerable applies to this damage.

element.name: Infernal Pact:
element.text: Add your Constitution modifier to the damage.
